welcome_message_body: Welcome to Roodepoort, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Trumps Grillhouse
restaurants.description: Trumps Grillhouse is a steakhouse located in the city.

restaurants.name: SUPERSPAR
restaurants.description: SUPERSPAR is a deli located in Roodepoort.

restaurants.name: RocoMamas
restaurants.description: RocoMamas is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pizza Perfect
restaurants.description: Pizza Perfect is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Golden rose chinese
restaurants.description: Golden rose chinese is a chinese restaurant located in Roodepoort.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lanseria Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours after providing their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: WiFi access is free for all passengers and can be accessed throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
